::: hero
### Fast, Intuitive, Reproducible Machine Learning in R

Welcome to **fastml**, your one-stop R package for lightning-fast model development, evaluation, and explainability—all in a single workflow.
:::

::::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
![](fastml_sticker.png){fig-alt="" width="180"}
:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
**Why choose fastml?**

-   🚀 One-line multi-model training\
-   🔍 Built-in EDA & correlation reporting\
-   ⚙️ Automatic tuning (grid & Bayesian)\
-   📊 SHAP & permutation-based explainability\
-   ⏱️ Parallel execution for large datasets
:::
:::::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 💿 Installation

``` r
install.packages("fastml")
```

------------------------------------------------------------------------
